update_message:
What's New in 2.0.7:

 Fixed Crossfade Engine - Tracks now properly crossfade instead of skipping

 Bluetooth/Headphone Controls - Play/pause/next/prev buttons now work correctly with Android crossfade engine

 Notification Improvements - Better metadata display and proper state handling

 Auto Library Refresh - Music library automatically updates when files change

 Bug fixes and stability improvements
